item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Nicki Minaj - Bahm Bahm [Direct Website Rip]
item.description:
Nicki Minaj - Bahm Bahm​

This took me two hours to rip.

Nicki's website put out an exclusive stream of her song "Bahm Bahm" from her upcoming album Pink Friday 2. The song was hosted by Ustudio, and quite had some protection. Through yt-dlp's referring tool and ffmpeg's codec correcting tool, here's the direct rip.

While poking around, I found that the original file name for the file that was put up for stream was "Bahm Bahm_9.8-(multi mix).mp3". So this is technically lossy, but was converted to FLAC to prevent more quality degradation.

Here's the generation for transparency: MP3 > WEB > MP4 [mismatched MPEG-TS/AAC stream] > MP4 [corrected audio stream] > AAC > WAV > FLAC. This AAC > WAV option produced far more quality than my MP4 [corrected audio stream] > FLAC situation.

This is an upgrade of previously uploaded YouTube videos where the audio was blown out.

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: infurtile
